item.description:
Hi All,
Worcester Pilots Assoc is having their meeting this Wednesday, June 3rd. They will be having a tour of the tower in ORH... But, it is not very busy there, sooooooooo, how about some of us fly to ORH and do some touch and go's....
They have offered to feed us burgers from their grille... I'm game.. Let's get there by 6:00. While they go into their meeting, we become part of it!

" Charlie - dinner is 6:30 in front of the ORH terminal. Let me know if you
need a pickup at Swissport. We'll be looking for you guys.
Dave"

Let's give em some business and something to look at.. I'll be at FIT around 5:30 (cause I like it there) to get ready for this journey.

We can actually be a lot of help to the guys getting the tour if we get a few planes to show up and fly around. Otherwise it's like a static display over there.

Hopefully see some of you Wednesday night to help them out.

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: ORH food and Fly
